column1: Cafe Ba-Ba-Reeba!////What can I say about this place? The food
column3: and service is amazing. The moment you walk in you can smell the amazing spices and food. We made reservations the day of for 10pm
column4: but we were able to be seated at 9:30. We got a half pitcher of sangria (delicious)
column6: and 3 desserts for $75. I highly recommend the garlic shrimp and the fried chicken. The desserts are fantastic as well. This place is great for date night or enjoying with friends-so you can try everything on the menu. Definitely worth it for the price and the quality of food!
